p: To examine the mechanism by which TCEO-induced apoptosis, the expression levels of various pro-apoptotic and anti-apoptotic genes was quantified using qRT-PCR analysis. Treatment of MCF-7 cells with TCEO 12.5 and 25 µg/mL for 24 h caused a dose-dependent decrease in anti-apoptotic Bcl-2 gene expression (p < 0.05), however, treated MCF-7 cells showed P53, Bax and caspases 8, 9, 3 upregulation by TCEO relative to glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase (GAPDH) internal control ( Fig. 5).
